languages.text: "Кровь — наш дар. Единственное, что только наше. Единственное, чем достойно чтить его".
"Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."
languages.original_text: "Кровь — наш дар. Единственное, что только наше. Единственное, чем достойно чтить его".

traits.locale_text: "Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way of worshipping and honouring Him."
"Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way of worshipping and honouring Him."
"Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."
"Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."
"Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."
"Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."

languages.text: « Le sang est notre cadeau. La seule chose qui nous appartienne réellement. Le seul vecteur qui soit digne de véhiculer notre dévotion envers Lui. »
languages.original_text: "Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."

traits.locale_text: « Le sang est notre cadeau. La seule chose qui nous appartienne réellement. Le seul vecteur qui soit digne de véhiculer notre dévotion envers Lui. »

languages.text: «La sangre es nuestro regalo. Lo único que de verdad nos pertenece. La única forma honrada de venerar Su honor».
languages.original_text: "Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."

traits.locale_text: «La sangre es nuestro regalo. Lo único que de verdad nos pertenece. La única forma honrada de venerar Su honor».

languages.text: 「血は我らの贈り物。それこそが唯一、真にこの手にあるものです。あの方を崇めて、讃えるのに相応しい唯一の方法です」
languages.original_text: "Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."

traits.locale_text: 「血は我らの贈り物。それこそが唯一、真にこの手にあるものです。あの方を崇めて、讃えるのに相応しい唯一の方法です」

languages.text: “鲜血是我们的礼物。这是唯一真正属于我们的东西，也是祭拜祂唯一合适的方式。”
languages.original_text: "Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."

traits.locale_text: “鲜血是我们的礼物。这是唯一真正属于我们的东西，也是祭拜祂唯一合适的方式。”

languages.text: "Blut ist unser Geschenk. Das Einzige, was wirklich uns gehört. Die einzig würdige Weise, ihn zu verherrlichen und zu ehren."
languages.original_text: "Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."

traits.locale_text: "Blut ist unser Geschenk. Das Einzige, was wirklich uns gehört. Die einzig würdige Weise, ihn zu verherrlichen und zu ehren."

languages.text: "Kan, bizim armağanımızdır. Hakikaten bizim olan tek şeydir. O'na tapınıp hürmetimizi göstermeye layık tek yoldur."
languages.original_text: "Blood is our gift. The only thing that is truly ours. The only worthy way to worship and honour Him."
